meanings.def: belonging to or connected with the particular place or area that you are talking about or with the place where you live
examples: A local man was accused of the murder.
Our children go to the local school.
a local newspaper (= one that gives local news)
decisions made at the local level
It was difficult to understand the local dialect.

meanings.def: affecting only one part of the body
examples: Her tooth was extracted under local anaesthetic.

related: Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government

meanings.def: a person who lives in a particular place or district
examples: She’s beginning to sound like one of the locals.
The victim was a local who jogged regularly in the park.
Tensions have been growing between students and locals in the area.
The troops arranged a friendly football match with locals.
We chatted with the locals at the island's only post office.

meanings.def: a pub near where you live
examples: I called in at my local on the way home.
It's a friendly local with good beer.

meanings.def: a branch of a labor union
a bus or train that stops at all places on the route
